name: fs-boot
description: Pure JavaScript implementation of common file-system API components
readme:
API

    ROOT
    SEPARATOR
    ALT_SEPARATOR
    SEPARATORS_RE()
    split(path)
    join(...path)
    resolve(...path)
    normal(...path)
    isAbsolute(path)
    isRelative(path)
    isRoot(path)
    root(path)
    directory(path)
    base(path, extension_opt)
    extension(path)
